TopicTitle: Parachutes deploying during takeoff, regardless of staging

Articles.Content:
Hello, all. I am just getting back into KSP after having been away for a long time. I love the updates that I'm seeing.

I started a career mode (playing on Steam) and when I make a rocket, the chutes deploy no matter what stage they are in. Has anyone else had this problem?
I don't recall seeing that problem. Can you share a pic of your staging display?

Okay, I think the problem is user error here. So sorry for taking your time but I appreciate the response.

Edited December 18, 2023 by thirstypuddle

3 minutes ago, thirstypuddle said:

Okay, I think the problem is user error here. So sorry for taking your time but I appreciate the response.

Mind sharing what the problem was, so it may help others in the future?
